sentences.english: This year, graduates in Anhui University even used wedding dresses.
sentences.chinese: 今年，安徽大學的畢業生甚至穿上了婚紗。

sentences.english: He has also studied at Chinese universities including the Foreign Affairs College in Beijing and Anhui University.
sentences.chinese: 此前，他曾在安徽大學和北京的外交學院學習。
